FieldDefinition.description: Localized fields that define this signal
FieldDefinition.name: displayFeatures

FieldDefinition.description: The localized Feature/Field that the current Feature/Field is being compared for redundancy against
FieldDefinition.name: displayRedundantWithFeature

FieldDefinition.description: The amount of additional information provided about the goal beyond that provided by the previously selected fields
FieldDefinition.name: informationGain

FieldDefinition.description: Measure of correlation between the goal field and signal fields
FieldDefinition.name: normalizedMutualInformation

FieldDefinition.description: Linear correlation between the goal field and signal fields (-1 to 1, where 0 = no correlation and -1 or 1 = high correlation)
FieldDefinition.name: pearsonsCorrelation

FieldDefinition.description: The Feature/Field that the current Feature/Field is being compared for redundancy against
FieldDefinition.name: redundantWithFeature
